description_for_human: Plugin for ChatGPT to help build your local code repo.
description_for_model: Plugin providing an API to work on the user's code repo. Before asking user for more details, try to get all context you need via context endpoints or summary-related endpoints defined for the plugin. If possible, satisfy requests using precise endpoints then expand to broader endpoints if deemed necessary (e.g. read a function first then a whole file if it's not enough info, write a function rather than a whole file whenever possible). Implement your solution step-by-step and show your work. Unless explicity instructed otherwise, ask the user permission before proceeding with major steps (especially write operations).
